title.rendered: How to Get the Best Job Recommendations on Handshake

content.rendered:
If you’ve already learned how to search for jobs, find great employers, and get career advice through Handshake, you’re well on your way to maximum job and internship hunt success! Now, it’s time to learn how to improve your job recommendations to see the coolest, most relevant opportunities every time you log into your profile. Watch the video below to learn our team’s top tips for getting better job recommendations and suggested internship opportunities, including:

  1. Update your interests
  2. Explore and save jobs
  3. Follow employers you like

excerpt.rendered: Our team shares tips for improving Handshake’s personalized suggestions.
